properties.value: A Chisel is a tool mainly used in the Crafting skill to cut and shape hard non-metals, mainly gems and limestone. Chisels are also used in Fletching to cut gems into bolt tips. Chisels are sold for the price of 1 coin at all general stores, except in Dorgesh-Kaan and East/West Ardougne. There is a free chisel spawn in the Crafting Guild, in Wizard Cromperty's house in north-east East Ardougne, and one at the dense essence mine. At 15 Construction, members can make a Tool store 1 for the workshop room of their house; this tool store provides an unlimited supply of chisels.

Item ID1755

A Chisel is a tool mainly used in the Crafting skill to cut and shape hard non-metals, mainly gems and limestone. Chisels are also used in Fletching to cut gems into bolt tips. Chisels are sold for the price of 1 coin at all general stores, except in Dorgesh-Kaan and East/West Ardougne. There is a free chisel spawn in the Crafting Guild, in Wizard Cromperty's house in north-east East Ardougne, and one at the dense essence mine. At 15 Construction, members can make a Tool store 1 for the workshop room of their house; this tool store provides an unlimited supply of chisels.
